short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will provide you with some simple shortcuts that can be useful when developing or authoring AEM Forms. 

Ctrl+I →…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will provide you with some simple shortcuts that can be useful when developing or authoring AEM Forms. 

Ctrl+I → Open System Console
Ctrl+E → Toggle edit/preview
Ctrl+U → Open crx
Ctrl+Shift+U → Open current path in crx

All shortcuts will open a new tab.
